A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What character development we got in TFA was backtracked with TLJ. Luke Skywalker felt so out of character\, and did not feel like the beloved Jedi we have come to know. The major villain was a big let down and so was Phasma. Way too much forced humor with little pay off for developed story lines. The movie wasn't terrible but by no means was it good.
